sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0244df841becde5067e82f40604bcb6a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DelegatedDeveloperAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>DelegatedDeveloperAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var DelegatedDeveloperAjax = Class.create();
DelegatedDeveloperAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    initializeChecklist: function() {
        var item_sysid = this.getParameter('sysparm_item_sysid') || '';
        if (item_sysid != '') {
			// Set the "Request Detail" checkbox for this Catalog Item to true
			// so that the items needed for input are shown by default.
            var clpsc = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_service_catalog');
            clpsc.addEncodedQuery('ritmISEMPTY^user=' + gs.getUserID() +
                '^checklist.catalog_item=' + item_sysid);
            clpsc.query();

            if (clpsc.next()) {
				item = new x_tygr_check.CLP().getItem(clpsc.sys_id.toString(), 'Request Details');
				item.complete = true;
				item.update(); 
			}
		}
    },

    checklistCreated: function(cat_item_name) {
        var checklist = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_config');
        if (checklist.get('name', 'CLP DD - Catalog - ' + cat_item_name)) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },

    type: 'DelegatedDeveloperAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 12:38:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>0244df841becde5067e82f40604bcb6a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DelegatedDeveloperAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0244df841becde5067e82f40604bcb6a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 13:21:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CLP sysapproval_approver Close Check</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// determine if the record is closed.  If it is and there are incomplete required checklist items
	// associated with the record, determine if the checklist configuration calls for a warning or to 
	// enforce the required checklist items by warning and aborting the transaction to insert or update
	var result = new x_tygr_check.Util().closeCheck(current,true);
	if (result.action == 'abort') {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-07 19:16:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2992037087a092109ef499783cbb3560</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP sysapproval_approver Close Check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2992037087a092109ef499783cbb3560</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-07 19:16:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2992037087a092109ef499783cbb3560"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_cat_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_cat_item">state=published^EQ<item display_value="Published" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="published"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CLP Deligated Developer - Del Cat Item</name><order>1000</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var cat_item = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
    var cat_item_name = current.getDisplayValue(); // when a sc_cat_item business rule
    gs.info('CLP Delegated Developer - Del Cat Item BR, for Catalog Item: ' +
        cat_item_name);

    var checklist = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_config');
    checklist.addEncodedQuery('nameSTARTSWITHCLP DD -^nameENDSWITH' + cat_item_name);
    checklist.query();
    while (checklist.next()) {
        checklist.deleteRecord(); 
    }

    var temp = new GlideRecord('x_tygr_check_template_config');
    if (temp.get('name', 'CLP DD - ' + cat_item_name)) {
        temp.deleteRecord();
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-10 22:11:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c6778bb1872856109ef499783cbb3518</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP Deligated Developer - Del Cat Item</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c6778bb1872856109ef499783cbb3518</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-10 22:27:26</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c6778bb1872856109ef499783cbb3518"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CLP DD - Set Request Details to True</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    setTimeout(function() {
        var ga = new GlideAjax('DelegatedDeveloperAjax');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'initializeChecklist');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_item_sysid', g_form.getUniqueValue());
        ga.getXML(function() {
            console.log('initializingDelegatedDeveloper');
        });
        console.log('waiting 2000 milliseconds before setting the value to true.');
    }, 2000);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 12:36:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cfc397841becde5067e82f40604bcb3b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP DD - Set Request Details to True</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cfc397841becde5067e82f40604bcb3b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 12:54:06</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set display_value="CLP DD">cf63df441becde5067e82f40604bcba1</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CLP sc_task Close Check</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// determine if the record is closed.  If it is and there are incomplete required checklist items
	// associated with the record, determine if the checklist configuration calls for a warning or to 
	// enforce the required checklist items by warning and aborting the transaction to insert or update
	var result = new x_tygr_check.Util().closeCheck(current,true);
	if (result.action == 'abort') {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-06 22:21:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>58736a2087e052109ef499783cbb3518</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP sc_task Close Check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_58736a2087e052109ef499783cbb3518</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-06 22:21:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=58736a2087e052109ef499783cbb3518"/></record_update>
